item.title: YOUR LOVE Live at Le Poisson Rouge NYC
item.description:
This is a piece I glued together from some shaky footage we had from one of our shows in NYC, Enjoy!

Don't forget to visit our Coke artist page at http://cokeurl.com/pmassive where you can vote by Facebook "Liking" all the videos and goodies you see! Each Like on each video and each wallpaper and any of the Pacha Massive goodies counts towards a vote to have us collaborate with Taio Cruz and perform at this year's American Music Awards, So make sure you go and vote now! Stay+
item.itunes:author: Pacha Massive

item.title: Coca Cola Collaboration Project
item.description:
In the middle of recording the new album we were chosen to be part of the Coca Cola Collaboration project, more info on http://cokeurl.com/pmassive
That was the perfect opportunity to take a break and play around with some motion graphics, here's a quick animation I made to a remix of "Tonight" from the latest album IF YOU WANT IT available from the itunes store.

You can participate in the collaboration and have us make a song with Taio Cruz, you know it will be top shelf! what's more we'd be performing the track at the upcoming American Music Awards! All you have to do is visit http://cokeurl.com/pmassive and click the Facebook "Like" on all the Pacha Massive videos and downloads you see, make sure you check all of them out and keep visiting for Liking new content, every Like counts! So visit Pacha Massive at http://cokeurl.com/pmassive now and click [Like]!

www.pachamassive.com
item.itunes:author: Pacha Massive
item.itunes:subtitle: Coca Cola Collaboration Project w/ Taio Cruz - Pacha Massive Animation
item.itunes:summary:

item.title: PACHA MASSIVE LiVE IN ISTANBUL!
item.description:
The server where this video was stored crashed and deleted this video- check out the newest animation clip! www.pachamassive.com

Check out Pacha Massive perform "Your Love" live at the Chill Out Festival 2008 in Istanbul! Be sure to check us out live this summer go to www.pachamassive.com for full details! And Don't Forget! our new Video for "All Good Things" is on the air so Check It Out!!
